name: trendlauncher
overview:
Inventions, Ideas, and Trends

Trend Launcher is a social networking site that allows innovators and inventors to connect and share ideas and trends by building communities through personal profiles, blogs, and comments.

There are people all over the world who have exciting and new ideas for creating innovative products or improving existing ones. Have you ever used an item and thought, I know how to make this easier or more functional? Trend Launcher is for you.

Be First with Purposeful Innovation

In a world of increased competition, intensified customer demands, and shifting employee demographics, a culture of innovation is more important than ever before. Trend Launcher provides companies that have new ideas or products with a venue to solicit feedback from potential customers from around the world in a private, targeted setting.

Members can reach out to companies and other individuals to share and sell products and ideas. By combining social networking and private disclosure opportunities, Trend Launcher provides an interactive venue for the exchange of ideas and information.

As a global company, Trend Launcher encourages international participation and strives to build a multi-cultural community of innovators.
